title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer x = − 2 or  5

x = − 2

1 point is earned for the correct reason

f' ( x ) changes from positive to negative at x = − 2 OR f is increasing to the left of x = − 2 and decreasing to the right of x = − 2 .

f' (-2) = 0 and f'' (-2) < 0

 

2/2 if x = 5 is justified

< -1 > if x = 5 is not justified

0/2 for point other than -2 or 5

3/4 points between Part A and Part B if reverse maximum and minimum

< -1 > for mismatching if clear
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer x = − 2   or  5

x = − 2

1 point is earned for the correct reason

f' ( x ) changes from positive to negative at x = − 2 OR f is increasing to the left of x = − 2 and decreasing to the right of x = − 2 .

f' (-2) = 0 and f'' (-2) < 0

2/2 if x = 5 is justified

< -1 > if x = 5 is not justified

0/2 for point other than -2 or 5

3/4 points between Part A and Part B if reverse maximum and minimum

< -1 > for mismatching if clear

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer x = − 2   or  5

x = − 2

1 point is earned for the correct reason

f' ( x ) changes from positive to negative at x = − 2 OR f is increasing to the left of x = − 2 and decreasing to the right of x = − 2 .

f' (-2) = 0 and f'' (-2) < 0

2/2 if x = 5 is justified

< -1 > if x = 5 is not justified

0/2 for point other than -2 or 5

3/4 points between Part A and Part B if reverse maximum and minimum

< -1 > for mismatching if clear

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer x = − 2   or  5

x = − 2

1 point is earned for the correct reason

f' ( x ) changes from positive to negative at x = − 2 OR f is increasing to the left of x = − 2 and decreasing to the right of x = − 2 .

f' (-2) = 0 and f'' (-2) < 0

2/2 if x =   5 is justified

< -1 > if x =   5 is not justified

0/2 for point other than -2 or 5

3/4 points between Part A and Part B if reverse maximum and minimum

< -1 > for mismatching if clear
